component.attributes:
&widget_var_attribute;
width false java.lang.String 100% Width of the div.
height false java.lang.String 100% Height of the pane.
rows true java.lang.String Number of rows. To specify by device type, specify a comma-separated list of phone/phablet/tablet.
cols true java.lang.String Number of columns. To specify by device type, specify a comma-separated list of phone/phablet/tablet.
styleClass false java.lang.String
Style class attached to the parent div.
paginatorTemplate false java.lang.String paginator template. Supported template elements are CurrentPage, PreviousPageLink, and NextPageLink.
itemList true java.lang.String Javascript expression containing referencing either a singleton object in the group or a list of objects.
condition false java.lang.String Javascript expression whose value (true/false) determines if this panel group is rendered.
renderer true java.lang.String Javascript function used to render each item in the group. Accepts the parent DOM element, the grid element, and the optional strings array as arguments.
strings false java.lang.String List of strings to supply to the renderer. Useful for internationalizing boilerplate text via JSF.
emptyMessage false java.lang.String Message to display when there are no items to show in the data grid.
dataWidget false java.lang.String Name of the data object required to render this panel group. Useful when the data is loaded dynamically on page load.
